title: Google Messages improving auto-categorization by asking for SMS ‘donations’ from selected users
content:
To help improve the auto-categorization of SMS and RCS messages, Google Messages is now asking selected users for SMS “donations.”

more…

The post Google Messages improving auto-categorization by asking for SMS ‘donations’ from selected users appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: To help improve the auto-categorization of SMS and RCS messages, Google Messages is now asking selected users for SMS "donations."
